title: One Who Geomances

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, choose to spend two nights geomancing (?) three players. At the end of the second night, if, among those three players, during those two nights, at least one attacked someone, at least one was attacked, and at least one did neither, give all three temporary complete death immunity and learn their roles and their actions will succeed no matter what for the rest of the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You visit your targets both nights when using your ability.
- You may target yourself.

desc:
Post 3437
*I don't even know what this word means, honestly.*
